check_udf.query: (SELECT name FROM mysql.func WHERE name='%s' LIMIT 0,1)='%s'

blind.query: SELECT TOP 1 name FROM master..syslogins WHERE name NOT IN (SELECT TOP %d name FROM master..syslogins ORDER BY name) ORDER BY name
blind.query2: SELECT TOP 1 name FROM sys.sql_logins WHERE name NOT IN (SELECT TOP %d name FROM sys.sql_logins ORDER BY name) ORDER BY name
blind.count2: SELECT LTRIM(STR(COUNT(name))) FROM sys.sql_logins

blind.query: SELECT TOP 1 master.dbo.fn_varbintohexstr(password) FROM master..sysxlogins WHERE name='%s' AND password NOT IN (SELECT TOP %d password FROM master..sysxlogins WHERE name='%s' ORDER BY password) ORDER BY password
